title: Global Automotive Steering System Market 2015-2019
text:
ReportBuyer
LONDON , Sept. 1, About automotive steering systems
Automotive steering systems have evolved from being rigid to being more flexible, technologically advanced and reliable, smooth, and easy to use. Present day automotive steering systems provide enhanced stability and agility. Rising demand for automobiles is also contributing to market growth. Furthermore, the introduction of steer-by-wire technology in automotive steering systems is expected to propel market growth.
Technavio's analysts forecast the global automotive steering system market grow at a CAGR of 5.89% over the period 2014-2019.
Covered in this report
Based on type, the global automotive steering system market can be segmented into manual steering and power steering.
Technavio's report, Global Automotive Steering System Market 2015-2019, has been prepared based on an in-depth market analysis with inputs from industry experts. The report covers APAC, the Americas, and EMEA; it also covers the global automotive steering system landscape and its growth prospects in the coming years. The report also includes a discussion on the key vendors operating in this market.
